question_have_account: Do you have an account already?
grades_across: Your grades across all your devices.
intro_gradely_helps_monitoring: Gradely helps to relieve your brain, because Gradely 2 can remember and monitor your grades.
intro_messaqge_sync: Your grades are stored in a cloud. So, you can edit and view your grades on all your devices.
intro_more_in_settings: More Informations can you find in Settings.
grade_result_change_in_settings: In Settings you can decide if your grades should be displayed as an average or Pluspoints.
intro_add_semester: Add a semester. No worries you can delete or edit this semester later.
settings_platforms_download_button: Download Gradely 2 for your other devices
contact_success_text: Thanks for your message. I will contact you with this email:
password_reset_success_text: An email to reset your password was sent. Please make sure you check your spam folder.
error_contact: Unfortunately there is an error. You can try it later or you can contact me under elias@eliasschneider.com
dream_grade_result_text: Your grade for the next exam should be:
tip_description: I invested a lot of time in this app. Of course I want that this app is free, but servers aren't free. With your support you can help to improve this app and pay the servers üñ§.
tip_only_mobile: Tips are only available on mobile.
re_enter_password_save_changes: Please re enter your password to save your changes
change_password_text: To change your password click the button below. You get an email there you can change your password.
delete_account_text: Warning! Do you really want to delete your account and your grades? This can't be undone.
error_stats_contain_no_date: Some of your grades don't have dates. Please add a date to every of your grade to see your statistics.
stats_description: This shows your grades along the date time period.
tip_contribute: Gradely 2's code is open source, you can help to improve Gradely 2 with your skills.
tip_success_text: Thank you soo much for supporting Gradely 2 üñ§.
no_network_offline_loading: It looks like you have a slow or no internet connection.
network_needed_text: To use this feature you need a network connection.
no_network: You're not connected to the internet.
contribute_leading_text: Gradely 2 is opensource, this means that everybody can help make this app better. If you want to contribute to make gradely better, here are you right ‚ù§Ô∏è.
contribute_translate_p1: To give every user an awesome experience, Gradely should be translated in many languages.
contribute_translate_p2: Found some language error, or better do you want to help translate Gradely in another language?
contribute_feature_bug_suggestion: Did you spot a bug or do you have an improvement or suggestion?
error_grade_badly_formatted: Please check if your grade or weight is correctly formatted.
intro_email_verification: You have to verify your email, so you can't lose your grades. We sent you an email to
check_email_spam: Please check also your spam folder.
error_email_not_verified: Please check your mails and verify your email.
error_server_down: The Gradely 2 server is down, try again in a few minutes
maintenance_hurry: If you're in hurry open the app without a network connection.
maintenance_description: We're improving your Gradely 2 experience. Try again in a few minutes.
intro_get_started_description: Enter your information to create a Gradely 2 account.
web_popup_description: You're using the Gradely 2 Web App. To get the best experience, download the Gradely 2 app.
duplicate_semester_text: Duplicating the semester will not duplicate your grades.
delete_confirmation: Do you really want to delete {} ?
showcase_semester_button: Click here to switch between your semesters.
showcase_add_subject_button: Here you can add a subject.
showcase_subject_list: This is a subject click on it to view your grades and swipe left to edit or delete it.
showcase_subject_list_desktop: This is a subject click on it to view your grades and left click to edit or delete it.
updated_needed_description: You're using an old version of Gradely 2. Please update to the latest version.
rate_gradely2_popup: Gradely 2 is completly free and without ads. It helps me very much if you would rate Gradely 2.
error_dream_grade_calculator_empty: You don't have any grades, so I can't calculate your dream grade.
